name: Asteroid Belt (Smaugler)
description:
Fly around and shoot in a game filled with asteroids. A parody of the 1979 Asteroids Game By Atari, Inc. This is a School Project made using OpenGL in Visual Studio 2019.

Controls:

  • WASD to Shoot
  • Mouse to Move
  • N to Mute/Unmute Sound Effects
  • M to Mute/Unmute Background Music
  • ESCAPE to End In-Game

Font By Raymond ⯈Larabie

Button Design By ⯈Josepth

Background Image By ⯈Westbeam

Background Music By Muz Station Productions
